thread.title: Lego Worlds Is Coming To Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Lego Worlds Is Coming To Nintendo Switch

author: Elise Favis
title: Lego Worlds Is Coming To Nintendo Switch
text:
by Elise Favis   05:05 PM 1,574 Views 2 
Lego Worlds is heading to the Nintendo Switch, according to developer Travellers Tales' head of design Arthur Parsons who confirmed the news on Twitter. 
The free-form Lego title is also coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC in February. Lego City Undercover is also coming to the Nintendo console. Release dates for both games on Switch remain unannounced for the time being. @jamievere currently we have announced that we are planning to release LEGO City and LEGO Worlds on switch â€” arthur parsons (@arthur_parsons) January 23, 2017 
You can check out all the announced games that have been confirmed for the Switch by heading here .
